TextBody:

Thanks for reaching out!

Please let me know what your availability is for tomorrow and Monday so we can schedule a remote session and take a look at what might be causing this.

Best regards,

TextBody:
Hi Carsten,

I scheduled the remote session and sent you an invite.
You can also join via the following link:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/84255334470?pwd=vO6pelAaKPUG9AczoOUdoZYNDZSFOZ.1

As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualisation environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.
 
Without having a  snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.
 
Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:
 
-Putty
-Zoom

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Hi Carsten,

I scheduled the remote session and sent you an invite.
You can also join via the following link:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/84255334470?pwd=vO6pelAaKPUG9AczoOUdoZYNDZSFOZ.1

As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualisation environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.
 
Without having a  snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.
 
Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:
 
-Putty
-Zoom

Best regards,
